articles.title: Vice FM of DPRK Meets Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
Vice FM of DPRK Meets Russian Ambassador
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Han Song Ryol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK for U.S. Affairs, met with Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, on Sunday to exchange the views on the present situation on the Korean peninsula.
					 The DPRK side said that the largest-ever DPRK-targeted joint military exercises of the U.S. and its buildup of strategic assets are the root cause of the tensions on the Korean peninsula, and expressed its stand to steadily take measures to bolster up its nuclear deterrence in order to defend the sovereignty and vital rights of the country and the peace on the peninsula from the U.S. nuclear war threat.
					
					 The Russian side expressed its understanding of the stand of the DPRK and hoped the tensions on the Korean peninsula would be defused as soon as possible.
					
					 Both sides agreed to boost cooperation in various fields in line with the long-standing friendly relations.

articles.title: Builders of Wonsan Army-People Power Station Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
Builders of Wonsan Army-People Power Station Tour Pyongyang
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Builders who performed labor feats in the construction of the Wonsan Army-People Power Station visited Pyongyang from April 26 to 30.
					 They visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, supreme temple of Juche, where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 At the halls of immortality, they paid tribute to the leaders.
					
					 They toured the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum and went round historic relics preserved with much care at the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They also visited the Revolutionary Martyrs' Cemetery on Mt Taesong where they put bunches of flowers before the bust of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 They also toured the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the Sci-tech Complex.
					
					 They spent a good time at the Nature Museum, the Central Zoo, the Kaeson Youth Park, the Munsu Water Park and the Rungra Dolphinarium.
					
					 They enjoyed performances given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the youth league and the National Acrobatic Troupe.
					
					 At a meeting with workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, they said that the construction of the power station helped them enshrine the transparent faith that self-development is the only way-out.

articles.title: Internet Seminar of America Held in Peru
articles.content:
Internet Seminar of America Held in Peru
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- An internet seminar on the undying revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu was held in Lima under the co-sponsorship of the American regional preparatory committee and the Peruvian preparatory committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu on April 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Present at the seminar were the American regional preparatory committee and other preparatory committees of 12 countries in the region for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, personages of political and social circles, media persons and citizens of Peru, personages of friendship and solidarity organizations of different countries, the DPRK ambassador to Peru and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland) who is chairman of the Peruvian preparatory committee, in his keynote report extended the humblest respect and the greatest glory to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il, Marshal Kim Jong Un and Kim Jong Suk, who made great contributions to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence, reflecting boundless reverence of the participants in the seminar and other progressive people.
					
					 Letters to the seminar from the DPRK preparatory committee and preparatory committees in different countries and regions were introduced.
					
					 Speakers praised Kim Il Sung as the peerlessly great sage unprecedented in history, father of socialist Korea and eternal sun. He will be immortal as the prominent leader of the Korean people and the world progressives as he clarified the way for emancipation of class, nation and mankind and made great contributions to the human cause of independence, they stated.
					
					 They praised Kim Jong Il for making the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung shine as the eternal guiding idea of the human cause of independence, injecting fresh vitality into the socialist movement and protecting the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation with the treasured sword of Songun. 
					
					 They spoke highly of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is demonstrating the might of the powerful Paektusan nation all over the world by translating the great leaders' wishes for building a powerful socialist nation into a reality.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in American Regional Internet Seminar
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in American Regional Internet Seminar
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the American regional internet seminar on the undying revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu on April 7. 
					 The letter said that the seminar marked an opportunity of conveying the noble revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and highly praising again the distinguished leadership ability of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 All the successes of the DPRK in recent years are natural fruition of the Songun politics and the people-first principle of Kim Jong Un working hard to make the DPRK the most dignified country and its people the happiest one, the letter noted.
					
					 It expressed the belief that under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un the DPRK would as ever display its might as a powerful country which is defending the advantageous independent and popular ideology and social system and the world peace and security while representing justice of the international community and become a reunified powerful country as wished by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The letter stressed the will of the participants in the seminar to make all efforts to splendidly hold the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu in the Mt Paektu area and Pyongyang in August this year.

articles.title: Minju Joson Warns U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Not to Run Wild
articles.content:
Minju Joson Warns U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Not to Run Wild
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers' hysteria for provoking the north has reached the height. This came under fire by a commentary of Minju Joson Sunday.
					 They are resorting to reckless military provocation like the joint north-targeted military rehearsal while clamoring for "preemptive attack on the north" and "special operation". This has pushed the tense situation on the Korean peninsula to an unpredictable dangerous phase, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The anti-DPRK war hysteria of the U.S. and the puppet forces is last-ditch efforts and gambling of those taken aback by the tremendous military capabilities of the DPRK.
					
					 The enemies have to know that military threat and blackmail with the mobilization of nuclear carriers and nuclear submarines can not work on the DPRK.
					
					 It is the toughest stand and stamina of the army and people of the DPRK to respond to the aggressors' provocation with immediate counterattack and the aggression war with the great war of justice for national reunification.
					
					 All the forces that took part in the recent anti-DPRK war rehearsal and the strongholds of aggression and provocation like military bases in south Korea and abroad and Chongwadae and White House are within the optical sight of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt Paektu.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group of traitors have to ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their foolish military provocation, and stop running wild.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Carrier Carl Vinson and S. Korean Puppet Navy Start DPRK-targeted War Drill
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Carrier Carl Vinson and S. Korean Puppet Navy Start DPRK-targeted War Drill
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers started joint military exercise in the East Sea of Korea on April 29 defying the repeated warnings of the DPRK.
					 Hurled into the saber-rattling were Carl Vinson nuclear carrier strike force, Aegis destroyer, sea-patrol planes, helicopters and other lethal operation means of the puppet navy.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers claim the exercise is a missile warning drill for detecting, tracking and intercepting missiles of the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Group of Conservatives' Moves to Come to Power Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Group of Conservatives' Moves to Come to Power Flailed
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The "Liberal Korea Party" and the "Parun Party" and other diehard conservatives of south Korea are working with bloodshot eyes to realize their ambition to seize power again with the upcoming "presidential election" as an occasion, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 What is utterly disgusting is that they have gone so wicked as to claim that they have nothing to do with Park Geun Hye while crying hoarse that "Park Geun Hye's era ended", "they will set right law and justice if they come to power" and "they are clean conservatives", the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean group of conservatives are a group of top class criminals who have committed all sorts of wrongdoings in cahoots with Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Traitor Park's crime is exactly that of the group of conservatives. The poisonous herb that took its roots in conservatism is Park Geun Hye, and the reactionaries of history who revived sycophancy and treachery, fascist dictatorship and the past practices of anti-reunification acts by investing the old ogre with power is none other than the puppet conservative forces.
					
					 The group of conservatives are idiots as they blindly followed and defended Park' acts whether they did harm to the interests of the nation or increased the danger of a war.
					
					 The criminals who revived the blood-stained "yusin" dictatorship the mere recollection of which make the south Koreans shudder with terror are also the group of conservatives.
					
					 The current north-south relations that plunged into a total stalemate is nothing irrelevant with the anti-reunification and confrontational crimes committed by the group of conservatives.
					
					 The reason that the whirlwind of confrontation with the fellow countrymen has not subsided in south Korea even though Park Geun Hye was thrown into a prison is because of the desperate efforts of the remnants of conservatives to maintain the already bankrupt confrontational policy.
					
					 It is the inevitability of history that the old forces ruin and it is the hope of the south Koreans that can not be dashed to achieve new politics and new life.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Unification Ministry's "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Unification Ministry's "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK Censured
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The puppet Unification Ministry of south Korea recently announced that it established the "basic plan for promoting human rights in the north" to be carried out for three years from this year.
					 The gentries of the ministry claimed that the plan is pursuant to the "law on human rights in the north" which officially went into force from September last year and it contains ways for "promoting human rights".
					
					 Papers here Sunday in commentaries say this clearly shows the despicable true colors of the confrontation-minded maniacs who desperately cling to confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north until they breathe their last.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that however loudly the Unification Ministry may trumpet about "human rights issue" of someone, no one will lend an ear to the rhetoric. It goes on:
					
					 The "basic plan" indicating the "north policy orientation" for the next-term regime is prompted by the sinister intention to justify the bankrupt policy for confrontation with the fellow countrymen and to make the implementation of the "human rights" racket a fixed policy under the next-term regime.
					
					 In other words, they seek to make the criminal history, in which they pushed the north-south relations into the worst catastrophe by serving Park Geun Hye as her cat's paw, repeat itself after the regime change and to put a brake on the improvement of the north-south ties.
					
					 The group of conservatives is making last-ditch efforts to do harm to the DPRK through "human rights" racket, but it is a pipedream that can never come true.
					
					 Minju Joson says no matter how desperately the puppet group may slander the DPRK, they can never bring down the socialist system in our country in which all the service personnel and people are united in single mind and in which the people's dignity and rights are guaranteed at the highest level.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Escalating Confrontation with North
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Escalating Confrontation with North
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea called a press conference outside the "government" building in Seoul on April 27 to urge the puppet authorities to stop escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and come out for improved south-north relations, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Speakers at the conference said economy has entered the era of no growth from the era of low growth, the south-north relations went bankrupt and businessmen and workers who worked for economic cooperation with the north are driven into death due to the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye regimes.
					
					 To overcome this, the misguided "north policy" must be withdrawn and the south-north relations must be improved, they stressed.
					
					 A press release read out there said that making peace settle on the Korean peninsula is one of the reformist tasks, calling for the resumption of the south-north dialogue and exchanges to this end.
					
					 The "government" has to come out for the improvement of the relations, though belatedly, and lift the "May 24 step" that blocks the exchange and resume the tour of Mt Kumgang and operation of the Kaesong Industrial Park, to begin with, it urged.

articles.title: U.S. Denounced for Forcing S. Korea to Bear Cost for THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
U.S. Denounced for Forcing S. Korea to Bear Cost for THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment, the Kimchon Citizens Measure Committeen for Checking THAAD Deployment and other organizations of south Korea reportedly held a press conference in Seoul on April 28 to denounce the U.S. for imposing cost for the THAAD deployment.
					 The U.S. is forcing the south Korean authorities to pay 1 billion U.S. dollars as the cost for the THAAD deployment.
					
					 Speakers at the conference said that they will fight it out with all possible means and methods for the withdrawal of the THAAD deployment.

articles.title: Vicecanciller coreano se reune con embajador ruso
articles.content:
Vicecanciller coreano se reune con embajador ruso
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- Han Song Ryol, viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores encargado de EE.UU. de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia 30 con el embajador ruso en la RPDC, Alexandr Matsegora, para intercambiar las opiniones sobre la actual situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					La parte coreana subrayo que los ejercicios conjuntos militares de gran envergadura y el incremento de las propiedades estrategicas de EE.UU. contra la RPDC devienen la causa de la agravacion de la situacion en la Peninsula Coreana y aclaro la posicion de seguir tomando las medidas por el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear para defender la soberania y el derecho a la subsistencia del pais y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana desde las amenazas de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. 
					
					La parte rusa expreso el entendimiento sobre la posicion de la RPDC y deseo que se aliviara lo mas pronto posible la situacion de la peninsula.
					
					Las ambas partes acordaron fortalecer mas las cooperaciones en varios sectores de acuerdo con las tradicionales relaciones de amistad.
